Title: The Curse of the Black Spot
Plot:
Location: In a pirate ship
Date: 1699
Enemies: Siren

The TARDIS is marooned onboard a 17th-century pirate ship whose crew is being attacked by a mysterious and beautiful sea creature.

Becalmed and beset by cabin fever, the pirates have numerous superstitious explanations for the Siren's appearance. The Doctor has other ideas but, as his theories are disproved and every plan of escape is thwarted, he must work to win the trust of the implacable Captain Avery and uncover the truth behind the pir
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
GuestStars: Hugh Bonneville, Lily Cole, Lee Ross, Michael Begley, Chris Jarman, Oscar Lloyd, Tony Lucken
